attributes.action: Allow pensioners and disabled passengers travel for free all day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any disabled person or pensioner is entitled to get a free bus pass, but only allowed to travel after 9:30am. This is obscene. What about if they have hospital/gp appointments early in the morning? I bet some of the above have turned down an early appointment just to save a few pounds. Also, they probably need to leave early to go on holidays to catch the bus to go to the coach station either for the airport or for a coach holiday.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
